title: WTB- Sheckard - No Glove Sovereign Back
author: Rascal1010

posts.post_title: WTB- Sheckard - No Glove Sovereign Back
posts.post_content:
Looking for a Jimmy Sheckard - No Glove (Pink Sky) Sovereign back.  Looking for either graded or raw.  Would like in VG condition, but will certainly look at better or worse conditions.

Can either pay cash or if you want to trade, have T206's to trade.

Best contact is to email me [url]Asmusstephen@gmail.com[/url] or send me a PM

Thanks,
Steve
